list-item.p: LINC00466 and PPP1R14B were up-regulated in glioma tissues and cells, miR-137 was down-regulated in glioma tissues and cells.
Overexpression of LINC00466 promoted glioma cells progression and resistance to TMZ.
LINC00466 promoted glioma progression by regulating miR-137.
LINC00466 targeted miR-137 to elevate the expression of PPP1R14B.
LINC00466 facilitated tumor growth in vivo.
